at.ac.tuwien.policenauts.l4.game

Class NonPlayerObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.policenauts.l4.game.GameObject
      • at.ac.tuwien.policenauts.l4.game.NonPlayerObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Asteroid, Collectible

    abstract class NonPlayerObject
extends GameObject
    Interface for all GameObjects on the screen which are not the player.

    • Method Detail

      • isVisible

        boolean isVisible()
        Checks, whether an object is visible or not. If this function returns false, the object will be skipped in the render loop and removed from the render list.
        Returns:
        True, if object is visible or possibly visible

      • setVisible

        void setVisible(boolean visible)
        Change the visibility of an object, from inside the object.
        Parameters:
        visible - The visibility of the object.

      • update

        public void update(float tpf,
                   float baseMovement)
        Update the game logic and frame of the game object.
        Specified by:
        update in class GameObject
        Parameters:
        tpf - Time per frame as calculated in the game loop
        baseMovement - Basic level movement amount, frame indepedent

      • applyEffect

        abstract void applyEffect(Player player)
        The object can apply a positive or negative effect on the player.
        Parameters:
        player - Apply the effect on this player

      • collisionEffect

        abstract void collisionEffect()
        This function is called, if a collision is being detected. It contains effects, which are applied on the object itself rather than the player, e.g. an asteroid splitting up on collision or a power up being consumed.

      • railgunHit

        abstract void railgunHit()
        This function is called, when the object is being hit with a railgun shot.

      • setSoundManager

        public void setSoundManager(SoundManager soundManager)
        Sets the soundManager.
        Parameters:
        soundManager - soundManager that is set
